test.name: Caso de teste 01 - Acesso ao menu "Mais Vendidos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'firefox' to base url 'browser = chrome'.
Firefox driver log is always forced to to: C:\Users\durval.neto\Documents\github\WebTesting\geckodriver-1.log
Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.

SessionNotCreatedException: Message: Expected browser binary location, but unable to find binary in default location, no 'moz:firefoxOptions.binary' capability provided, and no binary flag set on the command line

test.doc: Esse teste verifica o menu do site da Amazon.com.br e verifica a categoria computadores e informática.
